about.title: Why Moonfest?
about.paragraph1: Moonfest is the biggest and most anticipated furry convention in Colombia. With a unique experience, exciting activities, and spaces for the furry community, it’s an event you can’t miss!
about.paragraph2: In 2025, Moonfest returned stronger than ever, bringing together hundreds of attendees from across the country, and now in 2026 we invite you to be part of this celebration.
about.highlight: Want to attend? Reserve today and secure your place at this unforgettable event.

venue.title: Official venue
venue.name: ESTELAR Paipa Hotel & Convention Center
venue.description: Lakefront calm, forest trails, thermal jacuzzis, sauna, and a wellness spa make recovery between events effortless. The convention center is built for big gatherings, while three dining options (local, international, and Italian) plus a wine bar keep the nights social.
venue.description2: July in Paipa is cool (avg high 14.8°C, low 7.5°C), a comfortable range for fursuits and layered, fashion-forward looks that photograph beautifully. The scenery and spaces invite artistic expression, from shoots by the lake to relaxed lounges for sketching and collaboration.
venue.description3: On-site services keep your schedule full without leaving the property: business center, reliable Wi‑Fi, free parking, pet-friendly policies, and outdoor options like farm visits, horseback riding, and bike rides.
venue.feature2: Thermal jacuzzis, sauna, wellness spa, and pool
venue.feature3: Lakefront setting, forest trails, and photo-ready views
venue.feature4: 3 dining options: local, international, Italian + wine bar
venue.feature7: Business center, free Wi‑Fi, and free parking
venue.feature8: Farm visits, horseback riding, and bike rides
venue.certification: Safe Guard + Check in Certificado (MinCIT/Bureau Veritas)

q1.question: Can I book just one night?

q2.question: What does the package include?
q2.answer: Includes event entry, bus transport from Bogotá, room, and breakfast.

q3.question: How can I book?
q3.answer: You must reserve directly with the hotel using the official booking link.

q4.question: What happens if I don’t pay on time?

q5.question: Can I attend without staying at the hotel?
q5.answer: No, Moonfest is exclusive to hotel guests.

q6.question: Can I buy my ticket without booking?
q6.answer: Yes, but you won’t be able to attend without lodging. The ticket grants access to activities, but the reservation is required.

q7.question: What if I want to change my reservation?
q7.answer: Contact the hotel directly for any changes.
